articles.title: Michigan meteorite contains 'pristine' extraterrestrial organic compounds - Engadget
articles.description: A meteorite that lit up the night sky in Michigan in 2018 contains ‘pristine’ organic compounds that offer clues to how life formed on Earth, according to researchers.

articles.title: ‘Very excited’ astronomers discover activity on rare CENTAUR hybrid of comet and asteroid - RT
articles.description: A team of “very excited” astronomers have discovered activity around a rare type of space object that’s rocky like an asteroid but also clouded in dust and gas, like a comet.

articles.title: When North became South: Precise record of Earth’s last magnetic pole SWITCH created as fresh flip now long overdue - RT
articles.description: Earth’s magnetic poles have dramatically flipped several times throughout the course of our planet’s history. With another change long overdue, scientists have created the most detailed record yet of the most recent switcheroo.
